trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_ComClassAttribute" name="ComClassAttribute" href=""></xref> attribute instructs the compiler to add metadata that allows a class to be exposed as a COM object.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_ComClassAttribute" name="ComClassAttribute" href=""> </xref>属性指示编译器添加允许类公开为 COM 对象的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Use `ComClassAttribute` to simplify the process of exposing COM components from Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 使用`ComClassAttribute`以简化公开从 Visual Basic 的 COM 组件的过程。

trans-unit.source: COM objects are very different from .NET Framework assemblies; without the `ComClassAttribute`, you need to follow a number of steps to generate a COM object from Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: COM 对象有很大不同从.NET Framework 程序集;而无需`ComClassAttribute`，你需要遵循的步骤以从 Visual Basic 生成 COM 对象数。

trans-unit.source: For classes marked with `ComClassAttribute`, the compiler performs many of these steps automatically.
trans-unit.target: 为类标记为`ComClassAttribute`，编译器自动执行的许多这些步骤。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This attribute simplifies the creation of COM objects.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此特性简化了 COM 对象的创建。

trans-unit.source: To expose a class as a COM object, you must compile the project with the **Register for COM Interop** option selected in the **Build** section of the **Configuration Properties** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 若要公开为 COM 对象的类，你必须将项目编译与**为 COM 互操作注册**中选择选项**生成**部分**配置属性**对话框。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you can also expose a class created with Visual Basic as a COM object for unmanaged code to use, it is not a true COM object.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 尽管也可以公开 Visual basic 创建作为 COM 对象以供使用的非托管代码的类，它不是真正的 COM 对象。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [COM Interoperability in .NET Framework Applications](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 应用程序的 COM 互操作性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ComClassAttribute" name="ComClassAttribute" href=""></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref uid="langword_csharp_ComClassAttribute" name="ComClassAttribute" href=""></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use the constructor for the `ComClassAttribute` class to set the `ClassID`, `InterfaceID`, or `EventID` properties when applying the `ComClassAttribute` to a class.
trans-unit.target: 使用构造函数来`ComClassAttribute`类来设置`ClassID`， `InterfaceID`，或`EventID`属性时应用`ComClassAttribute`类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ComClassAttribute" name="ComClassAttribute" href=""></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref uid="langword_csharp_ComClassAttribute" name="ComClassAttribute" href=""></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use the constructor for the `ComClassAttribute` class to set the `ClassID`, `InterfaceID`, or `EventID` properties when applying the `ComClassAttribute` to a class.
trans-unit.target: 使用构造函数来`ComClassAttribute`类来设置`ClassID`， `InterfaceID`，或`EventID`属性时应用`ComClassAttribute`类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ClassID" name="ClassID" href=""></xref> property that is used to uniquely identify a class.
trans-unit.target: 值进行初始化<xref uid="langword_csharp_ClassID" name="ClassID" href=""></xref>属性，用于唯一标识类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ComClassAttribute" name="ComClassAttribute" href=""></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref uid="langword_csharp_ComClassAttribute" name="ComClassAttribute" href=""></xref>类。

trans-unit.target: 使用构造函数来`ComClassAttribute`类来设置`ClassID`， `InterfaceID`，或`EventID`属性时应用`ComClassAttribute`类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ClassID" name="ClassID" href=""></xref> property that is used to uniquely identify a class.
trans-unit.target: 值进行初始化<xref uid="langword_csharp_ClassID" name="ClassID" href=""></xref>属性，用于唯一标识类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_InterfaceID" name="InterfaceID" href=""></xref> property that is used to uniquely identify an interface.
trans-unit.target: 值进行初始化<xref uid="langword_csharp_InterfaceID" name="InterfaceID" href=""></xref>属性，用于唯一标识接口。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ComClassAttribute" name="ComClassAttribute" href=""></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref uid="langword_csharp_ComClassAttribute" name="ComClassAttribute" href=""></xref>类。

trans-unit.target: 使用构造函数来`ComClassAttribute`类来设置`ClassID`， `InterfaceID`，或`EventID`属性时应用`ComClassAttribute`类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ClassID" name="ClassID" href=""></xref> property that is used to uniquely identify a class.
trans-unit.target: 值进行初始化<xref uid="langword_csharp_ClassID" name="ClassID" href=""></xref>属性，用于唯一标识类。

trans-unit.target: 值进行初始化<xref uid="langword_csharp_InterfaceID" name="InterfaceID" href=""></xref>属性，用于唯一标识接口。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_EventID" name="EventID" href=""></xref> property that is used to uniquely identify an event.
trans-unit.target: 值进行初始化<xref uid="langword_csharp_EventID" name="EventID" href=""></xref>用于唯一标识事件的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a class ID used to uniquely identify a class.
trans-unit.target: 获取 ID 用于唯一标识类的类。

trans-unit.source: The constructor sets this property when the `ComClassAttribute` is applied to a class.
trans-unit.target: 构造函数将设置此属性时`ComClassAttribute`应用于类。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 只读。

trans-unit.source: A string that can be used by the compiler to uniquely identify the class when a COM object is created.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，编译器可以用于唯一标识时创建 COM 对象的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets an event ID used to uniquely identify an event.
trans-unit.target: 获取 ID 用于唯一标识事件的事件。

trans-unit.source: The constructor sets this property when the `ComClassAttribute` is applied to a class.
trans-unit.target: 构造函数将设置此属性时`ComClassAttribute`应用于类。

trans-unit.source: Read only.
trans-unit.target: 只读。

trans-unit.source: A string that can be used by the compiler to uniquely identify an event for the class when a COM object is created.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，编译器可以用于创建 COM 对象时唯一标识类的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an interface ID used to uniquely identify an interface.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个接口 ID 用于唯一标识接口。

trans-unit.source: The constructor sets this property when the `ComClassAttribute` is applied to a class.
trans-unit.target: 构造函数将设置此属性时`ComClassAttribute`应用于类。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 只读。

trans-unit.source: A string that can be used by the compiler to uniquely identify an interface for the class when a COM object is created.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，编译器可以用于创建 COM 对象时唯一标识类的接口。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the COM interface name shadows another member of the class or base class.
trans-unit.target: 指示 COM 接口名称隐藏的类或基类的另一个成员。

trans-unit.source: Shadowing is when a member uses the same name as another member.
trans-unit.target: 成员与另一个成员使用相同的名称时隐藏。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value that indicates that the COM interface name shadows another member of the class or base class.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""> </xref>值，该值指示 COM 接口名称隐藏的类或基类的另一个成员。
